Warg3791@... wrote: 

If Hijikata had a diary that would be awesome! Talk about "insider" 
information! 


Depends, IIRC the thing that was billed as "Yamazaki's diary" was some kind of duty roster/investigation reports. So Hijikata's diary may not contain much about him as a person, or about sensitive stuff (unlikely for ex that he wrote down things about the assassination of Serizawa or of Itou, in case someone found it). but we can always hope!


*Grin* Can we dare to hope he might elaborate on what happened during those 
three days with Saito?!


...three days with Saitou? Me = curious.
